--- title: 'Pertemuan 4 : Data Visualization (seaborn)' image: static\images\seaborn.png description: Data visualization in python using seaborn date: 04/30/2024 page-navigation: true format: html --- Kembali ke [EDA](./eda2024genap.qmd) # Seaborn
Seaborn adalah library visualisasi data yang dibangun di atas **matplotlib**, dan menggunakan struktur data yang ada pada library **pandas**. Seaborn banyak digunakan karena penggunaannya yang cukup *simple* dibandingkan dengan matplotlib.pyplot dengan hasil visualisasi yang lebih beragam. baca dokumentasi seaborn di sini : [Seaborn](https://seaborn.pydata.org/tutorial/introduction.html)
___ ::: {#dceaf450 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import numpy as np import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import seaborn as sns #load dataset yang disediakan oleh modul atau library seaborn iris = sns.load_dataset('iris') iris ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
sepal_length sepal_width petal_length petal_width species
0 5.1 3.5 1.4 0.2 setosa
1 4.9 3.0 1.4 0.2 setosa
2 4.7 3.2 1.3 0.2 setosa
3 4.6 3.1 1.5 0.2 setosa
4 5.0 3.6 1.4 0.2 setosa
... ... ... ... ... ...
145 6.7 3.0 5.2 2.3 virginica
146 6.3 2.5 5.0 1.9 virginica
147 6.5 3.0 5.2 2.0 virginica
148 6.2 3.4 5.4 2.3 virginica
149 5.9 3.0 5.1 1.8 virginica

150 rows × 5 columns

``` ::: :::
Berikut salah satu contoh visualisasi dari data iris yang dihasilkan oleh seaborn.
::: {#8c05900c .cell execution_count=2} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-3-output-1.png){width=633 height=411} ::: ::: ___ # Inputs
Seaborn memiliki 3 cara untuk menginput data sebagai parameter (sumbu y dan/atau sumbu x) dari fungsi-fungsi visualisasinya. 1. List/Series/Array 2. Pandas Dataframe dan kolom 3. Langsung masuk ke dataframenya untuk diolah
## List/Series/Array ::: {#b86ca486 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} #Mengambil isinya saja dari kolom sepal length dan sepal width length = iris['sepal_length'].values width = iris['sepal_width'].values print(length, width) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [5.1 4.9 4.7 4.6 5. 5.4 4.6 5. 4.4 4.9 5.4 4.8 4.8 4.3 5.8 5.7 5.4 5.1 5.7 5.1 5.4 5.1 4.6 5.1 4.8 5. 5. 5.2 5.2 4.7 4.8 5.4 5.2 5.5 4.9 5. 5.5 4.9 4.4 5.1 5. 4.5 4.4 5. 5.1 4.8 5.1 4.6 5.3 5. 7. 6.4 6.9 5.5 6.5 5.7 6.3 4.9 6.6 5.2 5. 5.9 6. 6.1 5.6 6.7 5.6 5.8 6.2 5.6 5.9 6.1 6.3 6.1 6.4 6.6 6.8 6.7 6. 5.7 5.5 5.5 5.8 6. 5.4 6. 6.7 6.3 5.6 5.5 5.5 6.1 5.8 5. 5.6 5.7 5.7 6.2 5.1 5.7 6.3 5.8 7.1 6.3 6.5 7.6 4.9 7.3 6.7 7.2 6.5 6.4 6.8 5.7 5.8 6.4 6.5 7.7 7.7 6. 6.9 5.6 7.7 6.3 6.7 7.2 6.2 6.1 6.4 7.2 7.4 7.9 6.4 6.3 6.1 7.7 6.3 6.4 6. 6.9 6.7 6.9 5.8 6.8 6.7 6.7 6.3 6.5 6.2 5.9] [3.5 3. 3.2 3.1 3.6 3.9 3.4 3.4 2.9 3.1 3.7 3.4 3. 3. 4. 4.4 3.9 3.5 3.8 3.8 3.4 3.7 3.6 3.3 3.4 3. 3.4 3.5 3.4 3.2 3.1 3.4 4.1 4.2 3.1 3.2 3.5 3.6 3. 3.4 3.5 2.3 3.2 3.5 3.8 3. 3.8 3.2 3.7 3.3 3.2 3.2 3.1 2.3 2.8 2.8 3.3 2.4 2.9 2.7 2. 3. 2.2 2.9 2.9 3.1 3. 2.7 2.2 2.5 3.2 2.8 2.5 2.8 2.9 3. 2.8 3. 2.9 2.6 2.4 2.4 2.7 2.7 3. 3.4 3.1 2.3 3. 2.5 2.6 3. 2.6 2.3 2.7 3. 2.9 2.9 2.5 2.8 3.3 2.7 3. 2.9 3. 3. 2.5 2.9 2.5 3.6 3.2 2.7 3. 2.5 2.8 3.2 3. 3.8 2.6 2.2 3.2 2.8 2.8 2.7 3.3 3.2 2.8 3. 2.8 3. 2.8 3.8 2.8 2.8 2.6 3. 3.4 3.1 3. 3.1 3.1 3.1 2.7 3.2 3.3 3. 2.5 3. 3.4 3. ] ``` ::: ::: ::: {#ff92c799 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.scatterplot(x=length, y=width) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-5-output-1.png){width=571 height=413} ::: ::: ## Dataframe dan kolomnya ::: {#9eed7699 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.scatterplot(x=iris['sepal_length'], y=iris['sepal_width']) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-6-output-1.png){width=589 height=432} ::: ::: atau ::: {#82f670c4 .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.scatterplot(x='sepal_length', y='sepal_width', data=iris) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-7-output-1.png){width=589 height=432} ::: ::: ## Olah dataframe ::: {#c65d8d90 .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.boxplot(data=iris) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-1.png){width=558 height=411} ::: ::: # Plots
Seaborn memiliki banyak sekali jenis plot dengan fungsi yang berbeda-beda. 5 diantaranya yang akan dibahas pada pertemuan ini : 1. Distribution Plot 2. Count Plot 3. Heatmap 4. Scatter Plot 5. Box Plot untuk plot lainnya, silakan telusuri dokumentasi seaborn berikut : [Seaborn Plots](https://seaborn.pydata.org/examples/index.html)
## Distribution Plot ::: {#24d247ff .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.displot(iris['petal_length']) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-9-output-1.png){width=470 height=470} ::: ::: ::: {#17bc3a69 .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} iris['petal_length'].skew() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9} ``` -0.27488417975101276 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#89db96c1 .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.displot(iris['sepal_width']) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-11-output-1.png){width=470 height=470} ::: ::: ::: {#04d7d474 .cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} iris['sepal_width'].skew() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=11} ``` 0.31896566471359966 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#ba1f2c81 .cell execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.histplot(iris['sepal_length']) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-13-output-1.png){width=585 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#6b5f5aa1 .cell execution_count=13} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.histplot(iris['sepal_width']) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-14-output-1.png){width=591 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#62a3aa8c .cell execution_count=14} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Histogram kumulatif dari sepal width sns.histplot(iris['sepal_width'], cumulative=True) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-15-output-1.png){width=600 height=429} ::: ::: ## Count Plot ::: {#84a86a23 .cell execution_count=15} ``` {.python .cell-code} #tips dari seaborn tips=sns.load_dataset('tips') tips ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=15} ```{=html}
total_bill tip sex smoker day time size
0 16.99 1.01 Female No Sun Dinner 2
1 10.34 1.66 Male No Sun Dinner 3
2 21.01 3.50 Male No Sun Dinner 3
3 23.68 3.31 Male No Sun Dinner 2
4 24.59 3.61 Female No Sun Dinner 4
... ... ... ... ... ... ... ...
239 29.03 5.92 Male No Sat Dinner 3
240 27.18 2.00 Female Yes Sat Dinner 2
241 22.67 2.00 Male Yes Sat Dinner 2
242 17.82 1.75 Male No Sat Dinner 2
243 18.78 3.00 Female No Thur Dinner 2

244 rows × 7 columns

``` ::: ::: ___ ::: {#75de84f5 .cell execution_count=16} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Histogram kumulatif dari sepal width sns.countplot(x='day', data=tips) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-17-output-1.png){width=585 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#fda09baf .cell execution_count=17} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Histogram kumulatif dari sepal width sns.countplot(x=tips['day']) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-18-output-1.png){width=585 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#1b9f0d86 .cell execution_count=18} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Histogram kumulatif dari sepal width sns.countplot(x='sex', data=tips, palette='Accent', hue='sex') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-19-output-1.png){width=593 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#7358e16f .cell execution_count=19} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Histogram kumulatif dari sepal width sns.countplot(x='day', data=tips, palette='Blues', hue='sex') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-20-output-1.png){width=585 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#31467d7d .cell execution_count=20} ``` {.python .cell-code} # Histogram kumulatif dari sepal width sns.countplot(x='sex', data=tips, palette='Blues', hue='day') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-21-output-1.png){width=585 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#642ae126 .cell execution_count=21} ``` {.python .cell-code} #Jika ingin mengammbar dalam sumbu vertikal ya y= sns.countplot(y='day', data=tips, palette='Blues', hue='sex') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-22-output-1.png){width=598 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#efde3b03 .cell execution_count=22} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.countplot(x='sex', data=tips, hue='smoker') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-23-output-1.png){width=593 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#5b6ac065 .cell execution_count=23} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.countplot(x='smoker', data=tips, hue='sex') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-24-output-1.png){width=593 height=429} ::: ::: ## Heatmap ::: {#b9ce0bf7 .cell execution_count=24} ``` {.python .cell-code} iris.drop('species', axis=1, inplace=True) iris ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=24} ```{=html}
sepal_length sepal_width petal_length petal_width
0 5.1 3.5 1.4 0.2
1 4.9 3.0 1.4 0.2
2 4.7 3.2 1.3 0.2
3 4.6 3.1 1.5 0.2
4 5.0 3.6 1.4 0.2
... ... ... ... ...
145 6.7 3.0 5.2 2.3
146 6.3 2.5 5.0 1.9
147 6.5 3.0 5.2 2.0
148 6.2 3.4 5.4 2.3
149 5.9 3.0 5.1 1.8

150 rows × 4 columns

``` ::: ::: ___ ::: {#65cd114f .cell execution_count=25} ``` {.python .cell-code} korelasi_iris = iris.corr() korelasi_iris ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=25} ```{=html}
sepal_length sepal_width petal_length petal_width
sepal_length 1.000000 -0.117570 0.871754 0.817941
sepal_width -0.117570 1.000000 -0.428440 -0.366126
petal_length 0.871754 -0.428440 1.000000 0.962865
petal_width 0.817941 -0.366126 0.962865 1.000000
``` ::: ::: ::: {#1d544f50 .cell execution_count=26} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.heatmap(iris.corr()) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-27-output-1.png){width=544 height=416} ::: ::: ::: {#643764b5 .cell execution_count=27} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.heatmap(iris.corr(), cmap='YlGnBu') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-28-output-1.png){width=544 height=416} ::: ::: ::: {#d8340281 .cell execution_count=28} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.heatmap(iris.corr(), cmap='YlGnBu') plt.xticks(rotation=45) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-29-output-1.png){width=544 height=472} ::: ::: ::: {#6de3acd7 .cell execution_count=29} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.heatmap(iris.corr(), cmap='YlGnBu') plt.yticks(rotation=45) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-30-output-1.png){width=600 height=416} ::: ::: ::: {#15139fa3 .cell execution_count=30} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.heatmap(iris.corr(), cmap='YlGnBu') plt.xticks(rotation=45) plt.yticks(rotation=45) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-31-output-1.png){width=600 height=472} ::: ::: ::: {#df4a12dc .cell execution_count=31} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.heatmap(korelasi_iris[(korelasi_iris >= 0.5)]) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-32-output-1.png){width=550 height=416} ::: ::: ::: {#ca54b84c .cell execution_count=32} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.heatmap(korelasi_iris[(korelasi_iris >= 0.5) | (korelasi_iris <= -0.2)]) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-33-output-1.png){width=544 height=416} ::: ::: ::: {#35d3ef77 .cell execution_count=33} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.heatmap(korelasi_iris[(korelasi_iris >= 0.5) | (korelasi_iris <= -0.2)], annot = True) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-34-output-1.png){width=544 height=416} ::: ::: ::: {#6b5ea55d .cell execution_count=34} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.heatmap(korelasi_iris[(korelasi_iris >= 0.5) | (korelasi_iris <= -0.2)], annot = True, cmap='Blues') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-35-output-1.png){width=544 height=416} ::: ::: ::: {#6f91b0cb .cell execution_count=35} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.heatmap(korelasi_iris[(korelasi_iris >= 0.5) | (korelasi_iris <= -0.2) ], annot = True, cmap = 'Blues', linewidth = 1, linecolor = 'black') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-36-output-1.png){width=544 height=416} ::: ::: ## Scatter Plot ::: {#6037a7d9 .cell execution_count=36} ``` {.python .cell-code} iris = sns.load_dataset('iris') iris ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=36} ```{=html}
sepal_length sepal_width petal_length petal_width species

``` ::: ::: ___ ::: {#14ea8174 .cell execution_count=37} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.scatterplot(x='sepal_length', y='sepal_width', data=iris, palette='Accent_r', hue='species') plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-38-output-1.png){width=589 height=432} ::: ::: ::: {#513c7e92 .cell execution_count=38} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.regplot(x='sepal_length', y='sepal_width', data=iris) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-39-output-1.png){width=589 height=432} ::: ::: ::: {#b23cc57a .cell execution_count=39} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.regplot(x='petal_length', y='petal_width', data=iris) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-40-output-1.png){width=589 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#ed0454af .cell execution_count=40} ``` {.python .cell-code} iris['petal_length'].corr(iris['petal_width']) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=40} ``` 0.9628654314027963 ``` ::: ::: ## Box Plot ::: {#850a4edb .cell execution_count=41} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.boxplot(x='petal_length', data=iris) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-42-output-1.png){width=545 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#b8ca60fa .cell execution_count=42} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.boxplot(x='sepal_width', data=iris) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](modul4_files/figure-html/cell-43-output-1.png){width=551 height=429} ::: ::: ::: {#c46335cb .cell execution_count=43} ``` {.python .cell-code} ?sns.countplot ``` :::
